title: No new missions ?
body:
It's been 2 days and I still have the same missions that I've already completed ... ?

note : (I just started doing the missions before 2 days, I just fixed my PC and got to play lol)

replies.body: Now that the Vs event is over, the missions have stopped rolling in for the time being. They'll be coming back a little later on, but I don't have the exact dates quite yet.

Dear Broporo,

Does that mean that the chaos/order tokens we currently have will disappear when the next event takes place or can we keep them untill then? I have 120 Chaos tokens and I was hoping I can get 20 more so I can open an Orb of Chaos, however, if they're gonna be branded useless I might as well get myself 3 key fragments before that happens. Would be nice to know. Thanks in advance.

Regards,
Unchovekable

Any leftover tokens will be going away on 7/24, so make sure to use them while you can! You should still be able to craft them into icons or hextech loot, and you can also disenchant them into essence at a rate of 10 Tokens = 10 Blue Essence.

Does this mean we can still earn tokens up until They expire? Currently on about 250 missed about two missions? And i didnt buy The trial. Or do you mean They are coming again in The future for say another another similar event in a few month?
i saw him say in another thread that they will be expired in 24 july so you can get the fragments or turn them into blue essence
